Articles.Title: Watch the first Nintendo Direct of 2023 here at 5PM ET
Articles.Description: Get ready, Nintendo fans: it’s almost time for the company’s first Direct of 2023. The showcase will mostly focus on games coming to Switch in the first half of this year and it will run for around 49 minutes. The Nintendo Direct starts at 5PM ET and you can …
